node_10.description: At that moment, the three kids witness the sudden appearance of an extremely tall Titan peering over the top of Wall Maria.
node_10.embedding_key: At that moment, the three kids witness the sudden appearance of an extremely tall Titan peering over the top of Wall Maria.

node_9.subject: someone
node_9.description: They save Armin, who is being beaten by local bullies and together discuss their desire to go outside the Walls.
node_9.embedding_key: They save Armin, who is being beaten by local bullies and together discuss their desire to go outside the Walls.

node_8.subject: someone
node_8.description: Annoyed, Eren leaves, with Mikasa following him.
node_8.embedding_key: Annoyed, Eren leaves, with Mikasa following him.

node_7.subject: someone
node_7.description: After returning home, Mikasa tells on Eren, revealing to his parents his desire to join the Survey Corps.
node_7.embedding_key: After returning home, Mikasa tells on Eren, revealing to his parents his desire to join the Survey Corps.

node_6.subject: someone
node_6.description: Later, both Eren and Mikasa watch the return of the Survey Corps forces, witnessing yet another failure of their expedition.
node_6.embedding_key: Later, both Eren and Mikasa watch the return of the Survey Corps forces, witnessing yet another failure of their expedition.

node_5.subject: someone
node_5.description: Mikasa watches as Eren complains about the soldiers slacking off while on duty.
node_5.embedding_key: Mikasa watches as Eren complains about the soldiers slacking off while on duty.

node_4.subject: someone
node_4.description: On their way home, they meet Hannes.
node_4.embedding_key: On their way home, they meet Hannes.

node_3.subject: someone
node_3.description: She is surprised to see tears in his eyes and asks why he was crying.
node_3.embedding_key: She is surprised to see tears in his eyes and asks why he was crying.

node_2.subject: someone
node_2.description: She is seen waking Eren up, telling him that they need to return to home.
node_2.embedding_key: She is seen waking Eren up, telling him that they need to return to home.

node_1.subject: someone
node_1.description: Mikasa appears for the first time in year 845 somewhere inside Wall Maria.
node_1.embedding_key: Mikasa appears for the first time in year 845 somewhere inside Wall Maria.
